title: Student nurse
creator_credit: Francis Searle and Gaumont-British Screen Services
brief_description: The story of a trainee nurse in Great Britain, from the time she is a probationer in a training hospital until the time she is a fully-qualified State-registered nurse. In hospital wards, laboratories, operating theatres, and lecture-rooms, she acquires during her years of training technical knowledge and practical skills.
